name: PuzzGrid
description:
PuzzGrid is a fast-paced match 3 puzzle game, challenging you for a high score!

Featuring 3 game modes: Blitz, Extend, and Moves.

Blitz - How many points can you score in 2 minutes?

Extend - Score as many points as possible before your health runs out!

Move - Score as much as possible in 250 moves.

This game is still in development so I would be happy if you want to send us a feedback. Be sure to look out for future updates!

Future Update Plans:

  • Soundtrack (yep...)
  • Garbage Mode
  • Multiplayer Battle
  • Better Graphics
  • More to come...
